ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) bag baby spinach leaves, rinsed and drained,   +   1/2 cup walnut pieces,   +   1/2 cup crumbled feta,   +   1/4 medium red onion, sliced very thin,   +   1/4 cup alfalfa sprouts (Optional),   +   1/2 cup pomegranate seeds, or to taste, 4 tablespoons balsamic vinaigrette
nutrition: Total Fat 21g 27%, Saturated Fat 6g 31%, Cholesterol 28mg 9%, Sodium 585mg 25%, Total Carbohydrate 15g 5%, Dietary Fiber 3g 11%, Total Sugars 9g, Protein 10g, Vitamin C 24mg 118%, Calcium 245mg 19%, Iron 3mg 19%, Potassium 596mg 13%
